title: Festka rolls out custom gravel bike with the soul of a rally car
content:
In 2019, the high-end Czech bicycle manufacturing company Festka turned heads across the cycling world with a stunning hand-crafted, 24k gold leaf porcelain-inspired road bike. For its $35,000 price tag, the bike was more a work of art than a serious, everyday steed. This year, Festka has rolled out a brand new, custom bike with [â€¦]

The post Festka rolls out custom gravel bike with the soul of a rally car appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Mark Wilson
